page.title: 15LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: In the area of {Sholing,Merry Oak and {Itchen,}there are estates of {houses} built in the early part of the 20th century and between the two world wars.They are mainly made of brick and are semi-detached or terraced.Some were built by the council and some were privately built.They have small gardens with little or no room between the houses so that the owners today have to leave their cars in the streets.This is not very good because the streets in some parts are not very wide. Recently,houses were pulled down when the Bitterne bypass was built. There are {open spaces}in the area such as {Freemantle Common,Peartree {Green}and the{Veracity Ground.
